posts.post_content:
*Bump to now price cards individually* All cards display much better than the assigned grade.

Price below includes shipping. If you like one just drop me an email. Payment via PayPal gift or money owed preferred.

Psa 4 - Boss Schmidt - off to Ebay
Sgc 50 - Lena Blackburne - off to Ebay
Sgc 50 - Dick Rudolph - off to Ebay
Sgc 50 - Buck Herzog NY - off to Ebay
Sgc 40 Jack Powell - $58 (SOLD)

Thanks all, Tony
[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]
